content: HSS G Drill bit Premium HSS ground drill bit for drilling small holes in metal, DIN 338 compliant ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Metal, wood and other material drill bits- - - ### FEATURES:Features Specially designed tip with split point for precise self-centering Fast start due to sharp 135-degree tip angle Spiral flute enabling easy chip removal, optimal application of lubricant to the drill bit tip and reduced heat generation Designed to get the maximum performance out of cordless tools â€“ so you get more work done per battery charge Applications Drilling in unalloyed and medium-alloyed steel ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Premium Connection end: Smooth shank Material composition: HSS M2 Technical Data | Product Class | Premium | Connection end | Smooth shank | Material composition | HSS M2 | DIN | DIN 338 ### ITEMS- 233868 - Black oxide drill bit 1/16 12 pk - Package Size 12 pc - 410605 - Black oxide drill bit 1/2 6 pk - Package Size 6 pc - 246474 - Black oxide drill bit 1/4 12 pk - Package Size 12 pc - 234421 - Black oxide drill bit 1/8 12 pk - Package Size 12 pc - 241360 - Black oxide drill bit 13/64 12 pk - Package Size 12 pc - 233883 - Black oxide drill bit 3/32 12 pk - Package Size 12 pc - 383956 - Black oxide drill bit 3/8 6 pk - Package Size 6 pc - 273328 - Black oxide drill bit 5/16 6 pk - Package Size 6 pc - 241283 - Black oxide drill bit 5/32 12 pk - Package Size 12 pc - 410601 - Black oxide drill bit 7/16 6 pk - Package Size 6 pc - 241361 - Black oxide drill bit 7/32 12 pk - Package Size 12 pc - 238001 - Black oxide drill bit 9/64 12 pk - Package Size 12 pc
